name: SoundForest
description:
Download on the App Store: http://tinyurl.com/y7xjlcw4

SoundForest is a mini music that allows you to instantly compose a song using a collection of musical creatures.

Features:

* 160 elements, each a unique music note
* 4 musical environments (SoundForest, ElectroJungle, SynthSavanna, EchoOcean)
* 6 pitch levels for each music note
* Make a quick loop or compose a mini song
* Endless song possibilities

SoundForest
is free to download. The full version of the app can be unlocked by
watching ads to unlock individual items or for $1.99 to unlock
everything.

Download: http://tinyurl.com/y7xjlcw4
Website: Soundforestapp.com
App trailer: https://vimeo.com/228597096
Press kit: Soundforestapp.com/presskit
